item.title: [Translation]Whoosh 2.7.4 Documentation
item.description: 英语小白，【原文地址】。store不知道怎么翻译合适，存储？ Quick start A quick introduction The Index and Schema objects The IndexWriter object The Searcher object Designing a schema About schemas and fields Built-in field types Creating a Schema Modifying the schema after indexing Dynamic fields Advanced schema setup Field
